text-snippet.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, IN NO EVENT WILL PARSEC (OR OUR SUPPLIERS) BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY LOST PROFITS, LOST DATA, COSTS OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE PRODUCTS, OR ANY INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM OR RELATING TO THESE TERMS OR YOUR USE OF, OR INABILITY TO USE, PARSEC PROPERTIES, EVEN IF PARSEC HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
